page.title: 02LANDSCAPE _ CROSLAND MOOR
page.content: Looking down into the{Colne Valley there are many{old mills}by the side of the{river & canal.}On{Manchester {Rd}there are a lot of{old houses & {spaces}where many have been {demolished.}Land rises{steeply}to {Crosland Moor}where the houses are {newer semis & terrace houses.}On {Blackmoorfoot Rd}there are some old houses & most of the shops are on this road at the{crossroads}of{Park Rd & {Dryclough Rd. St Lukes Hospital}is off Blackmoorfoot Rd. Getting nearer to {Beaumont Pk}the houses become{larger & {newer.}There are lots of{open spaces between St.Lukes & Beaumont Pk. Looking into the{Holme Valley}from Beaumont Pk the land slopes{steeply & there are{allotments}& a{cemetery}on the hillside. { {ALEXANDRA MAZIAR Crosland Moor Jnrs.
